alert.note: Alert for Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will bring heavy rainfall to portions of north central Worcester and northwestern Middlesex Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 337 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hubbardston, or 10 miles southwest of Fitchburg, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Leominster, Fitchburg, Gardner, Pepperell, Groton, Lunenburg, Townsend, Lancaster, Templeton, Rutland, Sterling, Ayer, Westminster, Shirley, Ashburnham, Hubbardston, Princeton, and Ashby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
